title: Nanodyne Measurement Systems, Inc.
content: We incorporated as Neonics, Inc. on January 7, 1987, to provide advanced electronic transformers for neon signs. We provided replacement parts for aftermarket repair of 1970's IBM tape drives (now only seen on old Sci-Fi movies). We changed our name to Nanodyne Measurement Systems in 2004 after shifting to nanomechanical test instruments. From 2009 to 2016 we developed a test socket for hard drive sliders, and were the sole supplier, delivering about 200,000 units.
